title: FOXic Workplace, Burger Kringe  7.20.20
itunes:title: FOXic Workplace, Burger Kringe  7.20.20
description:
In episode 675, Miles and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by There Are No Girls On The Internet host Bridget Todd to discuss Black Fox News staffers erupting over network's racism, Trump's election campaign polls, Burger King's new publicity stunt, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Fox News Staffers Erupt Over Network’s Racism: Bosses ‘Created a White Supremacist Cell’
  2. Kellyanne Conway Urges Trump to Resume Coronavirus Briefings to Boost Approval Ratings
  3. Cook shifts 20 House districts toward Democrats
  4. Disapproval of Trump coronavirus response jumps to 60 percent amid surge: poll
  5. Burger King Introduces 'Reduced Methane Emissions' Whopper as It Changes Cows' Diets Amid Climate Change
  6. WATCH: Burger King | Cows Menu Mexico
  7. Burger King is selling a burger made from cows on low-methane diet
  8. US farmers' beef with Burger King over cow fart ad
  9. Op-ed: Burger King’s New ‘Reduced Methane’ Beef May Be All Hat, No Cattle
  10. Inside the Race to Build the Burger of the Future
  11. WATCH: Cornelius - MIC CHECK

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
